data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,737,200 people living in Ekiti.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ekiti, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Ekiti, Nigeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ekiti, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Ekiti.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kamo people. Make the Kamo people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 705,168 believers in Ekiti.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Ekiti.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Ekiti to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Ekiti
location.people_groups_list: Koro Nulu, Kami, Ukwa, Kanuri, Yerwa, Kakanda
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koro Nulu (4,000), Kami (10,000), Ukwa (600), Kanuri, Yerwa (7,186,000), Kakanda (44,000)
